title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 202.1 - Prohibited operators
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 202.1 - Prohibited operators

State Regulations

No person shall operate a motor vehicle on any part of the
authority facilities unless that person is duly authorized to operate a motor
vehicle in the State of New York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
202.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
